author: desser1
title: From the Top 10 of Useful Bricks
review: What to say about a 32x32 green base plate? This one is very useful! I had one and it was always (!) around somewhre in my town or around my castles. It can be used for building houses on it, or a park, a forest, maybe with a small river and I remember buildíng a soccer field for my town. The green base plate in my eyes is one of the 10 most useful Lego "bricks" ever made.
